title: OneDiary
description:
OneDiary is a secure, privacy, multi-platform and multi-media journaling app. It is base on web1+web2+web3, and it is power with AI. It is a lifelong journaling app. 

It automatically records the time, location, weather, and tags for each entry, allowing you to capture your life through text, video, photos, and audio. It support 4 editors: standard editor, today record editor, rich text editor, markdown editor. 

You can synchronize data online(cloud disk) or offline( end-to-end).
